about.historyParagraph1: MULTITEL - Serviços de Telecomunicações, Lda, is an Angolan company operating in the market since 1999, licensed by INACOM to provide data transmission and Internet access services. With shareholders such as PT Ventures, Angola Telecom, and BCI, the company is dedicated to offering business solutions, consulting, maintenance, and telecommunications network management.
about.historyParagraph2: Committed to technological progress and customer satisfaction, MULTITEL values close relationships, focusing on personalized service with local and remote technical support. It has a qualified team of over 100 employees and complements its services with the support of strategic partners.
about.missionText: To contribute to digital inclusion and the development of ICTs in the market through innovative solutions and valuable experiences.
about.visionText: To be recognized as an excellent provider of integrated services in Telecommunications, Technologies, and Information Systems through trustworthy relationships with clients and partners.
about.cultureParagraph1: We promote a collaborative and dynamic work environment, where each team member is valued and encouraged to share their unique ideas and experiences.
about.cultureParagraph2: We believe that success is born from the union of diverse talents, mutual respect, and a commitment to excellence in every project we embrace.

slide1.title: Connect. Expand. Dominate.
slide1.description: We design network infrastructures that grow with your business — from installation to ongoing support. Fast, stable, and secure. Just the way it should be.

slide2.title: SmartCity Angola
slide2.description: Stream without buffering, enjoy clear video calls, and connect the whole house without slowing down. Your family deserves internet that truly delivers.

slide3.title: A more connected family.
slide3.description: Unlimited experience for gaming and streaming

navbar.micro_onda_desc: Fast and efficient solution for your company
navbar.selecione_categoria: Select a category to explore our services
navbar.solucoes_completas: We offer complete solutions for your company, from infrastructure to digital security

eventos.descricao: Discover the events and achievements that have shaped our journey

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.heroDescription: Connect your company to the future with cutting-edge technology, innovation, and security.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Connect your company to the future. Fast, secure, and unlimited connections.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Ideas that become solutions, solutions that make your business grow.

digitotal.title: Digitotal
digitotal.description: Digitize your business with smart solutions, everything your company needs to be 100% digital.

cybersecurity.title: Cyber Security
cybersecurity.description: Strong protection for your company's data and future.

fiberEnterprise.title: Fiber Enterprise
fiberEnterprise.benefit3: Personalized technical support with account manager
fiberEnterprise.advantage1: Perfect for operations with multiple departments and branches
fiberEnterprise.advantage2: Priority traffic for videoconferences and cloud backups
fiberEnterprise.advantage3: Scalable service according to company needs

proOffice.title: Pro Office
proOffice.benefit2: Dynamic IP with fixed IP option
proOffice.benefit3: Priority technical support with response time up to 6 hours
proOffice.advantage1: Recommended for offices with up to 10 employees
proOffice.advantage2: Allows simultaneous use of online platforms, billing software, CRM, etc.

smartBiz.title: SmartBiz
smartBiz.advantage1: Ideal for hybrid teams (on-site and remote)
smartBiz.advantage2: Perfect for online customer service, e-commerce, and internal servers
smartBiz.advantage3: Fast technical support, with on-site visits whenever necessary

powerNet.title: PowerNet
powerNet.advantage1: Ideal for environments with many connected devices
powerNet.advantage2: Guaranteed stability for management systems (ERP), VoIP calls, and internal platforms
powerNet.advantage3: Quarterly technical consulting for network optimization

startUP.title: StartUP
startUP.benefit1: Stable connection for small teams (up to 5 people)
startUP.advantage1: Ideal for videoconferences, social networks, and tools like Google Workspace and Zoom
startUP.advantage2: Affordable price and flexible monthly plan
startUP.advantage3: Upgrade option as the company grows

hero.title: Complete Information Security
hero.subtitle: Keep your business safe with advanced and compliant solutions.

cloud.title: Cloud Security
cloud.description: Comprehensive protection of your cloud assets, ensuring compliance and security in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud environments.

mobile.title: Mobile Security
mobile.description: Custom security solutions for mobile devices, protecting company data on smartphones and tablets.

outsourcing.title: Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Experienced information security team available for you, helping reduce costs and increase efficiency.

network.title: Network Security
network.description: Total protection of network infrastructure, with firewalls, IDS/IPS, and 24/7 monitoring.

endpoint.title: Endpoint Security
endpoint.description: Advanced protection for all devices, preventing threats and malware in real time.

recovery.title: Technological Recovery Plan
recovery.description: Strategies and solutions to ensure your business continuity even in the face of security incidents.

data.title: Data Security
data.description: Protection and management of sensitive data, ensuring compliance with Data Protection Law and other applicable standards.

forensics.title: Forensic Analysis
forensics.description: Detailed investigation of security incidents, with collection and analysis of digital evidence.

pentesting.title: Pentesting
pentesting.description: Comprehensive penetration tests to identify vulnerabilities before they are exploited.

training.title: Training
training.description: Information security training for your team, promoting a culture of digital protection.

app.title: Application Security
app.description: Analysis and protection of web and mobile applications, ensuring secure development from the ground up.

controls.title: Creation and Evaluation of Controls
controls.description: Implementation and evaluation of security measures aligned with market best practices.

dashboards.title: Creation of Interactive Dashboards
dashboards.description: Clear and interactive visualization of security metrics for well-informed decision making.

policies.title: Creation of Standards and Policies
policies.description: Development of security policies tailored to your business needs.

cloud_assessment.title: Cloud Security Assessment
cloud_assessment.description: Detailed analysis of cloud security, identifying risks and proposing improvements.

info_security.title: Information Security Solutions
info_security.description: Implementation of integrated information security solutions adapted to your business reality.

pen_tests.title: Penetration Testing
pen_tests.description: Thorough assessment of vulnerabilities through controlled and ethical intrusion tests.

risk_management.title: Risk Management
risk_management.description: Identification, analysis, and mitigation of security risks to protect your essential assets.

cta.title: Ready to strengthen your business security?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team and discover the best solutions to protect your business.
